jzqt - Python Tools Library
===========================

|build| |license| |version|

Test on python2.7, python3.4, python3.5, python3.6 and pypy, pypy3.

`Document <http://jzqt.readthedocs.io>`_

Installation
------------

.. code-block:: sh

    pip install jzqt

    :target: https://travis-ci.org/JZQT/jzqt
